analysis.description:
MettaCrowdsale.withdrawManagerBonus (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#373-381) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- managerETHaddress.transfer(managerETHbonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#376-377)

Reentrancy in MettaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#399-450):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#428)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- countOfSaleTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#429-433)

Reentrancy in MettaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#399-450):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#428)
	- token.transfer(referer,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#439)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- countOfSaleTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#439-440)

MettaCrowdsale.TransferTokenToIcoContract (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#348-356) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(ICOcontract,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#354-356)

MettaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#399-450) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#428)
	-token.transfer(referer,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#439)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,availabeTokensToSale) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol)

Reentrancy in MettaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#399-450):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#428)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#433-435)
	- currentPreICObalance (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#429)

Reentrancy in MettaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#399-450):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,availabeTokensToSale) (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol)
	- currentPreICObalance (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/19/0x3cecd05537ea3a9de9267c0e8a8abf218a903148.sol#7-10): it allows old versions
